## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G19490](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G19490)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATNHD1, NHD1</u>
- **Gene Name:** ARABIDOPSIS THALIANA NA/H ANTIPORTER 1, sodium:hydrogen antiporter 1
- **Description:**   sodium:hydrogen antiporter 1;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2090664
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [CS72464]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;elevated transient nonphotochemical quenching (NPQ) under nonsaturating light conditions, photosystem II damage and decreased biomass under long-term fluctuating light stress; reduced sodium tolerance
   - [SALK_008491]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Transient high NPQ in SALK_008491 is caused by loss of PGDH3.
   - [nhd1-2]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;Homozygotes not recoverable possibly due to linked lethal gene.
